participant_1.background:
I never worry about my appearance because I have better things to think about.
i have a dog and two cats.
I watch old Thierry Henry videos to cheer myself up.
I love to watch my food come together and to see how the flavors blend.
I have started to make plans for my retirement, including where I want to live and what I want to do with my time.

participant_2.background:
My favorite animal is a dog, but I've been with my lizard Gila for the longest time.
I don't play an instrument but I enjoy listening to music, especially The Lumineers.
i have trouble feeling emotion.
i sell miscellaneous stuff in local fairs.
I love watching Gila chase the sunbeams around my living room.

content.text: Hello! What do you like to do for fun?
I enjoy listening to music, and selling stuff at local fairs.
Nice! What kind of music do you like?
I like a lot of different types of music, but my favorite band is The Lumineers.
I've heard of them, but I don't think I've ever listened to them.
I will check them out. What kind of stuff do you sell at the fairs?
I sell a lot of different things, but my most popular items are handmade jewelry and soaps.
That's cool! I've always wanted to learn how to make jewelry.
It's not too hard! There are a lot of great tutorials online.
Maybe I'll give it a try.
You should! It's a lot of fun.
I'm not sure what I would make, though.
You could make anything you want! Necklaces, earrings, bracelets, rings, etc.
I guess I could make something for my dog or cats.
Yeah, I think they would like that.
You should definitely give it a try
